澭字的基本解释

澭
yōng
〔澭水〕古河名，约在今中国河南省商丘市一带。

澭
yǒng
水聚合。

澭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōng］
［《廣韻》於容切，平鍾，影。］
(1)古水名。约在今山东省菏泽市东北，为古黄河的岔流，故道已湮。
(2)古水名。约在今河南省商丘市一带。

澭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澭； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页653第16
【廣韻】【集韻】?於容切，音邕。水名。【呂氏春秋·察今篇】荆人欲襲宋，使人先表澭水。　又【集韻】【正韻】?於用切，雍去聲。與灉同。水自河出爲灉。

澭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
澭字的起名意思

暂无。

Xin
yōng
〔澭水〕The name of the ancient river is approximately in the area of Shangqiu City, Henan Province, China today.

Water polymerization.
Xin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yōng］
["Guangyun" Yu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Ying. ]
(1) Ancient water name. Approximately northeast of Heze City, Shandong Province, it was a fork of the ancient Yellow River, so the road is already in trouble.
(2) Ancient water names. Approximately in the area of Shangqiu City, Henan Province today.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　澭; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 653 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Rongqie, Yin Yong. Water name. [Lu Shichunqiu·chajin article] Jing people want to attack the Song Dynasty, so that people first show the water.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Use cutting, Yong Qu. Same with Yan. Water comes out of the river as a waste.
